survey_name: Employee Satisfaction with Workplace AI-Powered Scheduling Tools Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather employee feedback on the effectiveness, usability, and satisfaction with AI-powered scheduling tools implemented in the workplace.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use the AI-powered scheduling tool in your daily work?
questions.client_notes: This question helps assess adoption rates. Ensure options cover all potential usage frequencies.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use the AI-powered scheduling tool in your daily work?

questions.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered scheduling tool do you find most useful?
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify valued features. Include an option for 'None' to capture dissatisfaction.

script.question_text: Which features of the AI-powered scheduling tool do you find most useful?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the accuracy of the AI-powered scheduling tool?
questions.routing_logic: All respondents except those who answered 'Never' to Q1
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Exclude non-users.
questions.scripter_notes: Use radio buttons for single-choice selection.
